name: BOX (Tinytouchtales)
description:
BOX

2 player strategy game based on swaping tokens.

Instructions
Use your mouse to interact. Create as many tokens of your color as possible. Click to select a token then swipe up, down, left or right to swap with an adjacent token. Same colored tokens can't be swaped. When no more swaps are available a round is scored. Same colored tokens that are next to each other raise their score by 1. 3 rounds are played to finish a game.
